name: Venus: Farewell To The Dream
description:
From the creator of Venus: Improbable Dream comes a cute new story!

YouTuber and let's player FlareBlitzed is sadly quitting YouTube, and his support and enthusiasm for many indie games, including Venus: Improbable Dream, has been invaluable.  As part of a game jam in his name, a non-canon spin-off has been made, featuring plenty of the Venus characters, visuals and music you know and love!

Venus: Farewell To The Dream is a free, very short kinetic novel.  It takes roughly 15-30 minutes to play through, and has no choices, but a very sweet story tailored to FlareBlitzed's departure from YouTube.  With 'farewell' as its theme, how will we explore the ups and downs of having to say goodbye? 

WARNING:  Venus: Farewell To The Dream contains scenes that allude to events that take place in Venus: Improbable Dream, so if you haven't played the original game, you might want to avoid playing this first to avoid spoilers!
